contest-event.event-date:
April 27, 1986 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £70 and cup, 2nd £40 and cup, 3rd £30, 4th 20. March contest - 1st(£15 and cup) Hepworth, 2nd(£10) Holme. Hymn tune contest - 1st (£15 and cup) Holme, 2nd(£10) Home Charm Paints. 60th annual contest
April 4, 2012, 8:37 p.m. June 27, 2016, 10:02 p.m.
1 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst Kenilworth
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Dave Morris Spectrum [Vinter]
3 Hepworth Band Alan Jenkins Resurgam
4 Thornhill Brass David Loukes Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
Unknown Result Boarshurst 'B' B. Vaughan California Legend
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Lawrence Mann California Legend
Unknown Result Hade Edge Phil Garlick Triumphant Rhapsody
